name: ILP#2-BlobCity-Kye-Ting-Yang
description:
Gameplay Instructions:

Welcome to Blob City!

Use your mouse to grab and drop blue blobs onto the crate.

Press the spawn blobbies button to create more blobbies to collect. The creation is randomized so keep clicking until you get the blob you want.

Beware! Pink blobs may seem friendly but will ruin your collection process.
